title: Just got perma banned....had a troll team.....I don't think what I said was toxic...
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Yenah: are you troll
Yenah: dodge\
Yenah: please
In-Game
Yenah: karma veig vot
Yenah: bot
Yenah: why
Yenah: ?
Yenah: warwick camping me
Yenah: yi do some good ganks please
Yenah: biggest baiters
Yenah: if only we had an actual bot lane with actualy bot champs
Yenah: you arent getting camped like me bud
Yenah: reporterd
Yenah: are you done spamming yi?
Yenah: youve done nothing to help all game so stop spamming me
Yenah: reported
Yenah: says the 1-2 veig support
Yenah: ?
Yenah: what ya get for camping
Yenah: have fun getting banned bro
Yenah: you are so toxic
Yenah: especially choosing karma adc
Yenah: why troll?
Yenah: you arent funny
Yenah: report out bot lane please
Yenah: so toxic and trolling
Yenah: see
Yenah: ty
Yenah: hate getting troll teams like this
Yenah: hmmm okay sure
Yenah: another toxic player
Yenah: never said that
Yenah: where?
Yenah: tell me where?
Yenah: english please
Yenah: 0 grammar lol
Yenah: for doing what?
Yenah: what can you report me for
Post-Game
Yenah: how was I toxic?
Yenah: tell me please
Game 2
In-Game
Yenah: gj
Yenah: ?
Yenah: GJ
Yenah: i warned you guys
Yenah: stop being greedy
Yenah: i told you not to go in and you went anyway
Yenah: no lol
Yenah: i did
Yenah: *didnt
Yenah: wtf
Yenah: guys
Yenah: you are inting
Yenah: baits????
Yenah: i went in and got a kill
Yenah: caught him
Yenah: and ran away
Yenah: you are so greedy lol
Yenah: maybe cause i had 150 hp
Yenah: ryze just stop feeding bro
Yenah: ty
Yenah: ik
Yenah: ty
Yenah: why are you all inting
Yenah: pushing top lane
Yenah: i cant teleport everywhere mate
Yenah: just stop fighting
Yenah: its so simple
Yenah: lol okay kiddo
Yenah: cause you are inting blame me
Yenah: muted
Yenah: good one jhin
Yenah: report lux
Post-Game
Yenah: ay bro
Yenah: flaming me for you dying
Yenah: literally blaming me for your deaths cause im split pushing
Yenah: hate teams like this
Yenah: aye bro




There's my chat, but my team were a karma and veig troll duo bot, both flaming saying "You are shit zoe" "you are so bad zoe stfu" and more. Can't submit a ticket to support either cause it tells me to login when I'm already logged in. Help please...

replies.body: Riot are retarded, clearly not deserving of a ban.
